text: Volodymyr Stepanovych Holubnychy (; 2 June 1936 - 16 August 2021) was a Soviet and Ukrainian race walker. He won four Olympic medals: two gold (1960, 1968), one silver (1972) and one bronze (1964).Vladimir Golubnichy. Encyclopædia Britannica He was born in Sumy, Ukrainian SSR. Holubnychy died on 16 August 2021, aged 85.В Сумах умер легенда мирового спорта Владимир Голубничий ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Soviet athletes Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Racewalkers Category:People from Sumy Oblast
title: Volodymyr Holubnychy
